name: Modeling Disaster Response
description:
This serious game is a simplified simulation of a disaster response in the aftermath of an earthquake in a small geographical region.
It is the result of a final year project in the EPITA curriculum, carried out by 5 students of the SCIA specialization. Supervised by a Google employee and ex-Ubisoft, it features elements of adaptative artificial intelligence and procedural generation.
Before the development of the game itself, we researched on those topics and themes to establish a State of the Art.

Here you can play a development version of this project, with only a part of the final elements implemented.

The authors of this project are :
